naomi 2.3.15
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Naomi data model
    • Emulate a hintr model run
    • Naomi Model Workflow Example
  • Changelog

Get JSON template representing model run options

get_model_options_template.Rd

This reads JSON file of model run options which describe how the Naomi front end should display input options. Returns template for the API to enrich with model options.

get_model_options_template(art, anc)

Arguments

art

If FALSE then don't return template for ART control section.
anc

If FALSE then don't return template for ANC control section.

Value

Model run options template.

Examples

get_model_options_template(TRUE, TRUE)

#> $general
#> [1] "{  \"label\": \"General\",  \"description\": \"Select general model options:\",  \"controlGroups\": [    {      \"label\": \"Area scope\",      \"controls\": [        {          \"name\": \"area_scope\",          \"type\": \"multiselect\",          \"options\":            <+area_scope_options+>,          \"value\": <+area_scope_default+>,          \"required\": true        }      ]    },    {      \"label\": \"Area level\",      \"controls\": [        {          \"name\": \"area_level\",          \"type\": \"select\",          \"options\":            <+area_level_options+>,          \"value\": <+area_level_default+>,          \"required\": true        }      ]    },    {      \"label\": \"Calendar quarter to generate estimates\",      \"controls\": [        {          \"name\": \"calendar_quarter_t2\",          \"type\": \"select\",          \"options\":            <+calendar_quarter_t2_options+>,          \"value\": \"CY2020Q4\",          \"required\": true        }      ]    },    {      \"label\": \"Calendar quarter to generate short-term projection\",      \"controls\": [        {          \"name\": \"calendar_quarter_t3\",          \"type\": \"select\",          \"value\": \"CY2021Q3\",          \"helpText\": \"Calendar quarter to generate short-term projection. Must be after calendar quarter to generate estimates.\",          \"required\": true,          \"options\": [            {              \"id\": \"CY2020Q1\",              \"label\": \"March 2020\"            },            {              \"id\": \"CY2020Q2\",              \"label\": \"June 2020\"            },            {              \"id\": \"CY2020Q3\",              \"label\": \"September 2020\"            },            {              \"id\": \"CY2020Q4\",              \"label\": \"December 2020\"            },            {              \"id\": \"CY2021Q1\",              \"label\": \"March 2021\"            },            {              \"id\": \"CY2021Q2\",              \"label\": \"June 2021\"            },            {              \"id\": \"CY2021Q3\",              \"label\": \"September 2021\"            },            {              \"id\": \"CY2021Q4\",              \"label\": \"December 2021\"            },            {              \"id\": \"CY2022Q1\",              \"label\": \"March 2022\"            },            {              \"id\": \"CY2022Q2\",              \"label\": \"June 2022\"            },            {              \"id\": \"CY2022Q3\",              \"label\": \"September 2022\"            },            {              \"id\": \"CY2022Q4\",              \"label\": \"December 2022\"            }          ]        }      ]    }  ]}"
#> 
#> $survey
#> [1] "{  \"label\": \"Survey\",  \"description\": \"Select which survey to use for each indicator and whether to run the model with survey ART coverage or VLS.\",  \"controlGroups\": [    {      \"label\": \"Calendar quarter at midpoint of survey\",      \"controls\": [        {          \"name\": \"calendar_quarter_t1\",          \"type\": \"select\",          \"options\":            <+calendar_quarter_t1_options+>,          \"value\": <+calendar_quarter_t1_default+>,          \"required\": true        }      ]    },    {      \"label\": \"Prevalence\",      \"controls\": [        {          \"name\": \"survey_prevalence\",          \"type\": \"multiselect\",          \"options\":            <+survey_prevalence_options+>,          \"value\": <+survey_prevalence_default+>,          \"required\": true        }      ]    },    {      \"label\": \"ART coverage\",      \"controls\": [        {          \"name\": \"survey_art_coverage\",          \"type\": \"multiselect\",          \"options\":            <+survey_art_coverage_options+>,          \"value\": <+survey_art_coverage_default+>,          \"required\": false        }      ]    }  ]}"

#> $advanced
#> [1] "{  \"label\": \"Population calibration\",  \"description\": \"Options for calibrating to Spectrum population size. likelihood\"        },        {          \"name\": \"deff_prev\",          \"label\": \"ESS Scaling Factor\",          \"type\": \"number\",          \"required\": true,          \"value\": 1.0,          \"helpText\": \"Approximate DEFF to scale effective sample size for survey for HIV prevalence observations\"        }      ]    },    {      \"label\": \"Survey design effect - ART coverage\", get_model_options_template(FALSE, FALSE)

#> $general
#> [1] "{  \"label\": \"General\",  \"description\": \"Select general model options:\",  \"controlGroups\": [    {      \"label\": \"Area scope\",      \"controls\": [        {          \"name\": \"area_scope\",          \"type\": \"multiselect\",          \"options\":            <+area_scope_options+>,          \"value\": <+area_scope_default+>,          \"required\": true        }      ]    },    {      \"label\": \"Area level\",      \"controls\": [        {          \"name\": \"area_level\",          \"type\": \"select\",          \"options\":            <+area_level_options+>,          \"value\": <+area_level_default+>,          \"required\": true        }      ]    },    {      \"label\": \"Calendar quarter to generate estimates\",      \"controls\": [        {          \"name\": \"calendar_quarter_t2\",          \"type\": \"select\",          \"options\":            <+calendar_quarter_t2_options+>,          \"value\": \"CY2020Q4\",          \"required\": true        }      ]    },    {      \"label\": \"Calendar quarter to generate short-term projection\",      \"controls\": [        {          \"name\": \"calendar_quarter_t3\",          \"type\": \"select\",          \"value\": \"CY2021Q3\",          \"helpText\": \"Calendar quarter to generate short-term projection.
